titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding the Nation's law enforcement officers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Mr. Chabot moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 501.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/15/2000--Introduced. Calls for appropriate ceremonies to honor and recognize slain peace officers and the sacrifices and risks taken daily by all such officers.
